root.name: Awakening: Moonfell Wood
root.description: In the second installment in the Awakening series, Princess Sophia finds herself heading into the Moonfell Wood, where she hopes to find more clues to where her people are. She meets a new friend along the way, who helps out in solving some puzzles, too!The game features familiar hidden object scenes as well as other puzzles that fit the casual gamer's lifestyle.
